issues.environment: Green issues are my number one concern. I'm backing Norman Baker as he has been a strong champion on climate change and other environmental issues.

endorsements.endorsement: I am usually a UKIP voter, but because of his action on the proposed landfill site in Newick and his work in Parliament I am backing Norman Baker.

I've always voted Labour and have been a Labour candidate. But I think Norman Baker is an excellent constituency MP and I admire the hard work he's done in Parliament. So I will be backing him this time.
I usually vote Conservative but I believe that Norman Baker is the best constituency MP in the country and I will be voting for him.
Green issues are my number one concern. I'm backing Norman Baker as he has been a strong champion on climate change and other environmental issues.

quotes.text: In a decent world, all of Britain's 650 MPs would be like the indefatigable and incorruptible Norman Baker.
Norman Baker was one of the few politicians to criticise the Commons expenses system before the scandal was exposed.
Parliamentâ€™s most successful troublemaker has been a green issue focused before becoming an MP.
